channel.title: How do u make menus?
channel.description: were can u find menus, and where r the qests located? and last what is client.java

item.title: How do u make menus?
item.dc:creator: @chewy22 chewy22
item.description:
@chewy22 wrote:

For fr33sc4p3 (moight work on other sources) I go to the source, and open a folder on top that is called menus. There you can edit menus already on the server, or make a new one by making a new file, the titlename should be the name of your command. Like if i wannted to call a menu, “fathead” I would call the file fathead. In game you would type ::fathead to open it, dont include :: in the name though. Then just type in the text you want in the menu inside the new folder

Read full topic
